mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cupid and Psyche, general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The sculptural group ... is a replica of the work commissioned from Antonio Canova by the Russian Prince, Yussupoff (now in the Hermitage Museum of Saint Petersburg), derived from the original plaster model that Canova had given to his favourite student Tadolini, authorizing him to make as many copies as he wished. -- https://www.villacarlotta.it/en/the-museum/chamber-of-cupid-and-psyche/cupid-and-psyche/ [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
sculpture (visual work)
Cupid (Roman deity)
Psyche (Greek deity)
